jobTitle: Client Technical Professional -Watson Internet of Things, IBM Tririga
jobDescription: Job Description IBM is looking for an experienced Client Technical Professional (CTP) to represent IBM Tririga in a pre-sales role. As a member of the Watson Internet of Things Client Technical Professionals (CTP), you will drive the execution of all technical activities required in support of meeting revenue targets and supporting customers IoT business initiatives throughout the sales cycle. As a CTP, it will be your responsibility to understand the customers business and operational requirements and translate these requirements into the delivery of a compelling demonstration that will exceed expectations, and one that differentiates IBM from the competition. You will possess a deep understanding of the Watson IoT Asset Management platform (of which Tririga is a part of); understanding of the technical architecture, as well as the cognitive analytics and business intelligence layers of the solution(s). You will work directly with the Sales team to identify opportunities and lead technical sales strategies to meet customers requirements. You will articulate and demonstrate the value that IBMs Watson IoT solutions provide to our customers. You provide technical sales support which may include: collaboration with IBM sales teams to define, design, and detail the technical aspects and feasibility of proposed solutions; lead and deliver Proof of Concepts; develop and deliver customized demonstrations; support critical situations; and answer technical questions. As a member of the sales team, you will be engaged in customer facing activities, be responsible for the technical accuracy of the proposed solution, and lead the technical aspects of the sale.  The ideal candidate should be comfortable working independently as well as collaboratively in a dynamic team atmosphere. You must be self-motivated with a proven track record of consistently delivering strong business results and team success. In this customer facing role, strong oral and written communication and presentation skills are required. The role requires an organized and analytical individual, able to eliminate sales obstacles through creative and adaptive technical approaches.
